author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tub shower tile tips…I score and snap the tile on my Montolit Masterpiuma. Then I polish the bottom edge with a 200 grit pad. When I apply mortar, it’s parallel with the shortest side. The last step is to tap the tile and make the top edge level with my laser. For more tile tips and full step-by-step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tile #tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerenovations #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Tub Shower Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
